DIA_Getter_HavePurse_15_01: I hear you're carrying Larry's pouch.
DIA_Getter_HavePurse_13_02: Maybe I do, maybe I don't. What do you care?
DIA_Getter_HavePurse_13_04: And he confided in you? Apparently, he hasn't learned enough yet. All right, so what now?
DIA_Getter_HavePurse_Later_15_01: Nothing, we'll talk about it another time.
DIA_Getter_HavePurse_GiveIt_15_01: Give me the pocket or I'll take it myself.
DIA_Getter_HavePurse_GiveIt_13_02: I like to beat up a loser like that sometimes. Come on!
DIA_Getter_Hello_13_01: Hey, buddy, where you going? Hold on.
DIA_Getter_Hello_13_02: Would you be so kind to give a poor man a few coins?
DIA_Getter_Hello_Pay_13_02: I can't even buy a beer with that change. You know what, I'll wait. I'm not taking the last of your money.
DIA_Getter_Hello_WontGetAnything_13_01: Oh, what's so rough? I think someone needs to teach you some manners.
DIA_Getter_Hello_WhyYouWantGold_15_01: What do you need gold for?
DIA_Getter_Hello_WhyYouWantGold_13_01: You know how it is, your mouth is dry, you need something to rinse your throat. What do you say?
DIA_Getter_Hello_WhyYouWantGold_WontGetA: Sorry, you won't be drinking at my expense.
Is that the kind of friend you are? I think you need to be taught to respect your elders.
DIA_Getter_Hello_WhyYouWantGold_Pay_13_0: Well, I knew I could count on you. Thanks, man! I'll see you around.
DIA_Getter_DuelAfter_13_01: Well, was it worth it? I didn't want much.
DIA_Getter_DuelAfter_13_02: I hope we can meet again soon.
DIA_Getter_DuelAfter_13_03: Forget about it, it was just a little misunderstanding.
DIA_Getter_NextDay_13_01: Hey, friend, have you forgotten about me? You got something for me?
DIA_Getter_NextDay_Yes_13_02: And that's called a true friend. Thanks, I'll drink to your health!
DIA_Getter_NextDay_No_13_02: You think you're gonna get off that easy, loser?
DIA_Getter_GiveMeGold_15_01: How about it, you got my 20 gold pieces?
DIA_Getter_GiveMeGold_15_03: The roles are reversed. Give me the money.
DIA_Getter_GiveMeGold_03_04: Uh... alright, don't hit me again. That's all I got.
DIA_Getter_WonFightWithDan_13_01: I hear you beat our hero's ass pretty good. The fat man must be burning with shame.
DIA_Getter_WonFightWithDan_13_02: You're a fine guy. Take care of yourself.
DIA_Getter_StealPurseAfterDay_13_03: Do you see another ram here? After our last conversation, my pouch disappeared. Do you know anything about it?
DIA_Getter_StealPurseAfterDay_15_04: I have no idea what you're talking about.
DIA_Getter_StealPurseAfterDay_13_05: I don't believe you anyway. I'll keep an eye on you. You look suspicious.
DIA_Getter_Ambient_03_02: It's all good as long as I have something to drink.
DIA_Getter_Ambient_03_04: I think you have too much free time.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Hunt_Description: Would you care to stretch your bones? (Lead out)
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Hunt_15_01: Would you care to stretch your bones? We could clean up the swamp a bit and collect some trophies.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Hunt_03_03: Who wouldn't want to go hunting with Marvin - the slayer of Big Ben?
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Hunt_03_04: Let me know when you're ready.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_03_01: Some swampsharks fangs, bloodflies wings and stingers. Pretty good, something to drink at Oscar's for.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_15_02: Damned bloodflies. One time they sting you and you don't even feel it, another time the poison kills you in a few days.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_15_03: I have a good antidote here. Are you tempted?
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_03_04: Poison, an awful death unworthy of a warrior. Come on, it's better not to risk it.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_TransformL_03_02: But what can you expect from some cooked weed? I'm going back to the tavern, I need something to drink.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_TransformM_03_01: I guess I'd rather die slowly from the bloodfly's poison than spit out my own guts after the antidote.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_TransformM_03_02: Keep it to yourself, I'm going back to the Haven.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_TransformH_03_01: Aaa! Damn! It's starting to burn me! My whole body is on fire!
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_Next_03_01: Thanks! Let me know if you still feel like hunting some beasts.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_Wait_15_01: If I were you, I'd hold off on that for a while. Let the antidote settle.
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Monster_03_02: What did you give me to drink? See what I look like? Do you see my hands?
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Monster_03_03: Because of you, I can't even pick up my sword. I won't forgive you!
DIA_Getter_SQ406_Potion_TransformL_Wait_: If I were you, I would hold off on this for a while.
